creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Priest's robe, composed of squares and strips of grey ribbed silk brocaded in blue, grey, white tan, brown and red silk and gold thread with repeat motifs of dragons flanked by clouds, peach blossoms and other symbolic designs. Border of same material with mitered corners, each corner carrying an appliqu√©d square of same. Silk broken and mended along lines of former folds. Horizon blue taffeta lining.
title: Priest's robe
